metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3863 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in nfc_llcp_find_local innet/nfc/llcp_core.c in NFC in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a localuser with special privileges to impact a kernel information leak issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-164-generic - 5.4.0-164.181
linux-image-5.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-164.181
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-164-generic - 5.4.0-164.181
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-164-lowlatency - 5.4.0-164.181
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-86-generic - 5.15.0-86.96~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-86-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-86.96~20.04.1
